job.title: Insurance Sales Agent
job.description: <p>If you live in the Charlotte Region and surrounding areas and don't have the following at your disposal, you owe it to yourself to contact me today to have a confidential conversation:</p><p>Free marketing support, free exclusive direct-mail and telemarketing leads from interested consumers handed out weekly. We will get you in front of far more&nbsp;&nbsp;people than you are currently seeing.</p><p>Free training, office space, desk, phone, admin support, CRM, business cards, etc. (No hidden fees.)</p><p>165+ Insurance carriers, including many of the nations top insurance companies. This allows for the best possible solution for each client’s individual need.&nbsp;You will always be able to do the BEST job for your clients.&nbsp;We offer Index Annuities, Life Insurance, Medicare, LTC, Dental, Hospital Indemnity, etc</p><p>Ownership of your renewals, overwrites, and clients.</p><p>Agents receive top level payouts, significantly higher than most "Career Agencies".</p><p>This is the support we offer agents at American Insurance Marketing Solutions.&nbsp;All of this is provided&nbsp;&nbsp;free of charge with no hidden costs deducted from your paycheck every week. Email or call me if you are interested in a confidential interview. Email: tripp@goaims.net or Call: 980.333.0003</p><p><br></p>
